La Señora María tiene una pequeña tienda de comestibles hace 10 años, labora en ella de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo. También se dedica a la cría y venta de cuyes  que vende cuando tiene alguna necesidad económica.
 
En el banco comunal se encuentra hace 10 años y los créditos anteriores le han beneficiado para su negocio, su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para tener mayor surtido en su tienda.

Su meta es agrandar su tienda.
texts.en:
María is a member of the “Alianza Unida” communal bank.  She lives in Llacao Parish (Cuenca).  This place has beautiful scenery to enjoy and admire.  Its people are merchants, raise livestock and farm.  They are noted for being kind, charming and mutually supportive people who keep the culture and traditions of their people.

María is 65 years old, married and has 10 children, all adults, married and living on their own.  Her husband is a farmer and the house they live in belongs to them.

María has had a small grocery store for the last 10 years.  She works there from Sunday to Sunday with no fixed work schedule.  She also raises guinea pigs to sell when she has an economic need.

She has been in the communal bank for ten years and the previous loans have been beneficial for her business.  She is going to use the new loan to buy stock merchandise for her store so that she can have more variety in it.  Her goal is to enlarge her store.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Santos Eduviges

texts.es:
S., necesita un nuevo prestamo para comprar más artículos para la tienda, (arroz, azúcar, aceite, frijoles) ya que el crédito anterior le sirvió para fortalecer mas su negocio, debido a la demanda que tiene en los meses venideros.
Gracias al crédito anterior, le ayudo a crecer en sus ganancias y a tener productos que antes no tenía, y por medio D. este negocio ha logrado construir otra vivienda, por eso quiere seguir trabajando con la institución.
texts.en:
S. needs a new loan to buy more products for her store (rice, sugar, oil and beans).  Her previous loan helped her to further strengthen her business in anticipation of the demand that she will have in the coming months.

S.' previous loan helped her to increase her profits and have products available that she didn't have before.  Through her business, she has managed to build another house.  For this reason, she would like to continue working with the institution.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil and beans for her business

loans.name: Betty Consuelo

texts.es:
Betty D. 56 años, vive en su casa propia junto con su esposo e hijo, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito D. Chepén que pertenece al departamento D. la Libertad.  Esta zona se caracteriza por ser agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

La actividad que desarrolla Betty es la venta D. carne D. pollo en el interior del mercado central D. Chepen, su negocio lo tiene desD. hace varios años, atiendes D. muy temprano hasta la una D. la tarD. cuenta con su propia clientela por la calidad del producto que venD., con los ingresos D. sus ventas podrá cubrir sus necesidades D. su familia.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 3000 nuevos soles para comprar más carne D. pollo para seguir satisfaciendo la necesidad D. sus clientes, al aumentar sus ventas podrá pagar su crédito otorgado y mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su hijo, brindándole mejores comodidades.
texts.en:
Betty, 56, lives in her own house which has all basic utilities with her husband and son in an urban part of Chepén District that belongs to La Libertad Department.  This zone is noted for farming, animal husbandry and tourism.

Betty sells chicken meat insiD. the Chepén central market.  She’s had the business for several years.  She works from very early in the morning until one in the afternoon.  She has her own established clientele thanks to the quality of the product she sells.  Income from her sales allows her to cover family needs.

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 3000 new sol loan to buy more chicken meat to continue meeting customer demand.  Increasing sales will make it possible for her to repay the loan she was granted and to improve her son’s quality of life providing more comforts for him.

loans.use: to buy more chicken meat.

loans.name: Pedro Ismael

texts.es: El señor Pedro, es un pequeño agricultor de la zona de Ticuantepe, el habita junto a su esposa e hijos, los planes hacia su familia es poder  brindarle un mejor bienestar ya que ellos no lograron estudiar una carrera debido a sus recursos  económicos , don Pedro desde hace varios años de dedica al cultivo de piña y cítricos , la mayor afectación que se le presenta es que no cuenta con los recursos necesarios para poder inducir la producción , ya que actualmente una plaga llamada (mosca blanca ) está afectando los cultivo lo cual para él es importante poder comprar fertilizantes e insumos necesarios para el cultivo .Agradece el apoyo y la confianza que le brinda Afodenic  atrávez de los fondo Kiva para una mejor producción .
texts.en: Pedro is a small farmer in the Ticuantepe zone.  He lives with his wife and children.  His family plan is to provide better wellbeing for hem since they were unable to study a career due to economic resources.  Pedro has been farming pineapple and citrus fruit for several years.   His greatest problem is not having the necessary resources for crop “inducción”[a method to attain uniform maturity and also to control the time of harvest] since a pest known as white fly is currently affecting the crops so it’s important for him to be able to buy fertilizer and the necessary farm supplies for the crops. He is grateful for the support he gets from Afodenic through the Kiva fund for a better production.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Clemencia Concepción

texts.es:
La Señora Clemencia es socia del banco comunal Alianza Unida, vive por la parroquia de Chiquintad (Cuenca), este lugar tiene hermosos paisajes para admirar y disfrutar, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales y a la agricultura, se caracterizan por ser personas amables, gentiles y solidarias, mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora. Clemencia tiene 64 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos quienes son mayores de edad, casados e independientes. Su esposo es comerciante, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

Doña Clemencia trabaja en su propio negocio, ella tiene un restaurante y entrega de viandas, esta actividad la desempeña hace 6 años y trabaja de lunes a viernes todo el día. En sus tiempos libres también se dedica la costura realizando todo arreglo de prendas de vestir.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 13 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de vajilla y víveres para su negocio. 

Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Clemencia is a member of the “Alianza Unida” communal bank.  She lives in Chiquintad Parish (Cuenca).  This place has beautiful scenery to admire and enjoy.  Its residents are merchants, raise livestock and farm.  They are noted for being kind, charming and mutually supportive; they keep their customs and traditions.

Clemencia is 64 years old, married and has two children who are adults, married and independent.  Her husband’s a merchant.  They do not own a house; they are renters.

Clemencia works in her own business. She has a restaurant and also delivers meals.  She’s been in this business for six years.  She works Monday through Friday all day.  In her free time she also sews making all sorts of clothing repairs and alterations.

She’s been a member of the communal bank for 13 years and will use her new loan to buy dinnerware and foodstuffs for her restaurant.  Her dream is to have a house of her own.

loans.use: to buy dinnerware and foodstuffs.

loans.name: Braulio

texts.es:
Braulio de 64 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.   Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Braulio desde hace muchos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral (aves y ovejas), sus corrales se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados, los alimenta con comida balanceada, pastos y granos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un óptimo crecimiento para poderlos ofrecer en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos diarios de su hogar.  También cuenta con tierras de cultivo donde siembra limón y mango, una vez que cosecha cuenta con otro ingreso para su casa.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimento balanceado, sanidad de sus animales y de fertilizante para mejorar sus tierras de cultivo, con las ganancias que obtenga en ambas actividades podrá cubrir su crédito como tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Braulio es una persona que con esfuerzo y mucho empeño a sabido sacar adelante a su familia para que logren su objetivo trazado.
texts.en:
Braulio, 64, lives with his family in his own house which only has electricity and is located in a rural part of Tambogrande District that belongs to Piura Department.  This zone is noted for farming, animal husbandry and crafts.

Braulio has been raising small farm animals for many years (fowl and sheep) to sell.  His corrals are in his back yard.  They are apt.  He feeds his animals nutritionally balanced feed, grasses and natural grains so that they will attain optimum growth so that they can be sold in various local markets obtaining good profits to meet daily household expenses.  He also owns farmland where he plants lemons and mangoes.  When they are harvested, he has an additional source of income for his household.

He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to buy nutritionally balanced feed, medicine for his animals and fertilizer to improve his farmland.  Income from both activities will allow him to repay his loan and to have a better quality of life.  Braulio is a person who has known though his effort and dedication how to get his family ahead to reach their goals.

loans.use: to buy animal feed, medicine and fertilizer.

loans.name: Maria Josefina

texts.es:
María, utilizara el nuevo crédito para comprar más mercadería como el material para elaborar flores artificiales, espelma, colorantes y papel,  ya que debido a que ahora tiene más clientes quiere seguir incrementando sus ganancias.
El crédito anterior le ayudo a fortalecer su negocio ahora con un nuevo lograra aumentar en la elaboracion de las flores para poder sacar a su familia adelante y seguir trabajando con la institución.
texts.en:
María will use the new loan to buy more merchandise such as materials to make artificial flowers: wax, coloring and paper. Right now she has more customers and she wants to keep increasing her earnings. 

The previous loan helped to strengthen her business. Now, with a new one, she will be able to increase flower production to be able to get her family ahead and keep working with the institution.

loans.use: to buy paper, coloring and wax to make artificial flowers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy his own motorcycle

loans.name: Faasiamani

texts.en:
Faasiamani is a 20 year old single woman.  She plants and harvests fruits and vegetables for sale.  Faasiamani has one year of experience in this business.    

She needs a loan of WST $1000 to purchase farm supplies and equipment.  Faasiamani plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 240 Talas or US $100 per week) to improve/expand her business.

In 2011, Faasiamani joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Faasiamani's first loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase general farm supplies & equipment.

loans.name: Pelenatete

texts.en:
Pelenatete is a 46 year old married woman with four children.  She sells snacks and other delicacies in the local community.  She has been in business for one year.    

Pelenatete needs a loan of WST $1000 to purchase additional products to sell.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 200 Talas or US $83 per week) to improve/expand her business.

In 2011, Pelenatete joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Pelenatete's first loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Rosa Hilda

texts.es:
Rosa de 30 años de edad, vive con sus hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, la cual pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Rosa desde hace 3 años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (cuenta 10 cabezas de ovejas), porcino (8 cerdos) y aves de corral, sus corrales se encuentra en la parte externa de su casa, los cuales son apropiados, los alimenta con comida balanceada,  pastos y granos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para qué pueda ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos diarios de su hogar.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para compra de más alimento balanceado para sus animales, con los ingresos que obtenga pueda cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Rosa es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que sus hijos se superen y  tener mejoras económicas.
texts.en:
Rosa, 30, lives with her children in her own house which only has electricity and is located in the rural part of Tambogrande District that belongs to Piura Department.  This zone is known for farming, raising livestock and crafts.

For the last three years Rosa has been raising sheep (she owns ten head of sheep), pigs (8 pigs) and barnyard fowl.  Her corrals which are appropriate for this are in her back yard.  She feeds her animals nutritionally balanced feed, grasses and natural grains so that they will reach optimum growth and be able to be sold in the various local markets thus obtaining good profits to cover her daily household expenses.

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan to buy more nutritionally balanced animal feed.  With income she obtains she will be able to repay the loan and improve her family’s quality of life.  Rosa is a hardworking, very responsible person.  The only thing she wants is that her children get ahead and to improve economically.

loans.use: to buy more animal feed.

loans.name: Seuseuolefa

texts.en:
Seuseuolefa is a 55 year old widow with six children. She plants and harvests fruits and vegetables for sale.  She has many years of experience in this business. 

Seuseuolefa needs a loan of WST $2500 to purchase farm supplies and equipment.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 200 Talas or US $83 per week) to support her family.

In 2008, Seuseuolefa joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Seuseuolefa's fourth loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase general farm supplies & equipment.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan Antonio de 23 años,  labora para el Ministerio de Educación como docente de Educación primaria. Esta solicitando su 2do credito el que invertirá el préstamo para compra de materiales de contrucción, es un hombre responsable, honesto y bien trabajador  en la comunidad que habita a  es una persona de buenas costumbres,  en su centro de trabajo es muy querido,  su mayor sueño en la vida es mejorar sus condiciones de au vivienda y de su familia, él además de trabajar continua con sus estudios para lograr ser un mejor profesional y servir a su comunidad con eficiencia y profesionalismo.
texts.en: Juan Antonio, 23, works for the Ministry of Education as an elementary educator. He is requesting his second loan which he will use to purchase construction materials. He is a responsible, honest and hardworking man. He is known in his community as a person with good values and is very beloved at his workplace. The greatest dream in his life is to improve living conditions for his family and himself. In addition to working, he is also continuing his education so that he can be a better professional and serve his community in an effective, professional manner.

loans.use: to purchase materials.

loans.name: Jose Pepe

texts.es:
EEl socio pertenece al banco comunal ”LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE ANDAHUAYLILLAS”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Jose; El socio tiene 45 años de edad, el socio es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos de 15, 8 años de edad; el socio  trabaja por las tardes y noches tocando en un grupo de música llamado “ALMENDRA”, el socio integra junto a tres amigos músicos este grupo el cual anima en todos los eventos matrimoniales y otros compromisos en el bello poblado de Andahuaylillas, el socio toca, batería, guitarra, órgano, cajón, el socio y sus amigos trabajan animando estos eventos semanalmente, el socio también tiene terrenos de cultivos de maíz, y junto a sus conyugue trabajan vendiendo lo que producen sus terrenos, en esta ocasión el socio desea invertir el crédito en uso de su hogar en la comida diaria, él desea poder comprar víveres para las dos semanas siguientes y dar una parte a su conyugue para que ella invierta en un nuevo negocio para apoyar en casa al conyugue. El socio solicita el prestamo para invertir en el hogar en viveres.

El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the communal bank “Las Emprendedoras de Andahuaylillas” (The Entrepreneurs of Andahuaylillas). The communal bank is located in the Andahuaylillas district in the Cusco province, department of Cusco. 

The borrower is Jose. He is 45 years old, and he lives with his life partner and has two children who are 15 and 8 years old. In the afternoons and evenings he plays in the musical group called “Almendra.” He and three musician friends got together to make this group which plays at all the weddings and other events in the beautiful valley of Andahuaylillas. Jose plays the drums, guitar, organ, and crate. He and his friends liven up these weekly events. 

Jose also has corn fields, and together with his partner they work selling what their fields produce. At this time Jose would like to invest his loan into his household’s daily food. He would like to be able to buy supplies for the next two weeks and give a portion to his partner so that she can invest it into a new business to supply the household. He asks for a loan to invest in household supplies. 

Jose is thankful for the loan and promises to comply with the terms of the agreement according to the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to invest in household supplies

loans.name: Vaituutuu

texts.en:
Vaituutuu is a 38 year old married woman with three children. Vaituutuu sells baked goods in the local community.  She has 4 years of experience in this business. 

Vaituutuu needs a loan of WST $1500 to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 400 Talas or US $167 per week) to improve/expand her business.

In 2010, Vaituutuu joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Vaituutuu's second loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale.

loans.name: Pedro Santiago

texts.es: El Sr. Pedro es un hombre separado, tiene dos hijos los cuales ya son independientes, el Sr. Pedro es un hombre luchador y constante en el trabajo diario que realiza, él se dedica a prestar el servicio de taxi en una moto alquilada; eligió este tipo de trabajo porque le es muy rentable, lleva trabajando en este negocio por mas de 2 años. El crédito otorgado lo va a invertir en la compra de su propia moto para realizar el mismo servicio. Sus principales sueños es tener su propio auto para trabajarlo y ganar más y tener más seguridad. El esta muy agradecido por la confianza depositada en su persona.
texts.en:
Pedro is separated and has two children who already live independently.  Pedro is a tenacious man who perseveres in the daily work that he carries out.  His business is providing a taxi service with a motorcycle that he hires.  He chose this work because it is very profitable.  He has been working in this business for more than two years.

Pedro will invest his loan in buying his own motorcycle with which he will provide the same service.  His main dreams are to own his own car (to work in), to earn more and to have more security.  He is grateful for the trust that is being placed in him.

loans.use: to buy his own motorcycle

loans.name: Juan Norberto

texts.es:
Juan, vive con su familia, tiene a cargo un hijo de 18 años de edad, él es empleado de la alcaldía municipal, trabaja de lunes a viernes de 8:00am a 4:00pm, desde hace 4 años.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de ladrillo de piso y compra de unas ventanas, esta inversión ayudara tanto a su familia como a Juan, porque estará mejorando las instalaciones de la vivienda, ofreciéndoles una mayor comodidad y seguridad.
El propósito de Juan es terminar con los detalles de su vivienda, cuidar su empleo para poder ayudar a su familia y ser responsable con el préstamo.
texts.en:
Juan lives with his family and has an 18-year-old son in his care.  He works for the council.  He works from Monday to Friday, from 8.00am to 4.00pm and has been in this job for four years.

Juan is currently requesting a loan to buy paving bricks and some windows.  This investment will help both Juan and his family because he is improving their home in order to provide them with more comfort and security.  Juan's goal is to finish his home and to do well at work so that he can help his family and be responsible with his loan.

loans.use: to buy paving bricks and some windows

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”IMASUMAC II”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Luz Marina; La socia tiene 23 años de edad, la socia es soltera, la socia tiene 2 hijos; La socia  se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, ella tiene terrenos agrícolas en los cuales siembra y cosecha maíz blanco, la socia vende su producción y también se dedica  a la crianza de animales menores al socia cría gallinas y cuyes, ella desea en esta ocasión invertir su préstamo en la compra de animales menores como cuyes en un numero de 50 y gallinas 10 para la cría y la venta. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de gallinas y de cuyes.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the communal bank “Imasumac II.” The bank is located in the Huanchac district, in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco. 

The borrower is Marina. She is 23 years old and single; she has two children. Marina mainly works in agriculture. She has farmland where she plants and harvests white corn. She sells her product, and she also breeds small animals, hens and guinea pigs. She would like to invest her loan into the purchase of small animals like 50 guinea pigs and 10 hens to breed and sell. Marina asks for a loan to invest in the purchase of hens and guinea pigs. 

Marina is thankful for the loan and promises to comply with the terms of the agreement according to the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy hens and guinea pigs

loans.name: Ofelia De La Paz

texts.es:
Ofelia, se dedica a la venta de jabones y cremas naturales, ella vive con su madre y tiene una hija de 6 años de edad; Ofelia es empleada como impulsadora de supermercados, además de esta ocupación vende a los compañeros y amigos cremas y jabones naturales.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de jabones de esencia de caracol y cremas de concha de nacara, estos productos son los que ella provee para la venta, y este préstamo le ayudara para tener disponibilidad de productos.
La aspiración de Ofelia es que con la compra sus ventas mejoren, obtener buenas ganancias las cuales utilizaría para operar a su hija, quien padece una enfermedad en uno de sus pies.
texts.en:
Ofelia sells natural soaps and creams. She lives with her mother and has a daughter who is 6 years old. Ofelia works as a promoter at supermarkets. In addition to this, she sells creams and natural soaps to friends and colleagues.

Currently she is asking for a loan to buy soap made of essence of conch shell and creams made of mother-of-pearl. These are the products she sells  and this loan will help her have products available. 

Ofelia's ambition is that with this purchase her sales will improve, she will make a good income which she will use for an operation on her daughter who suffers from a disease in one of her feet.

loans.use: to buy soap made of  essense of conch shell and mother-of-pearl creams.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
Felicitas es socia del Banco Comunal “Bellavista” ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada y tiene 02 hijos en edad escolar.  La señora estudio educación secundaria.
Trabaja desde hace dos ciclos con el Movimiento Manuela R., su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de puertas, ventanas, etc, todo  de metales.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 400.00 nuevo soles, comprará fierro, tubos, fierro liso y angulares, en el negocio tiene trabajadores que la apoyan con los pedidos, nos cuenta que ella se presenta a licitaciones.
Su esposo trabaja en el municipio. 
Desea tener una empresa de techos y tener más maquinas para soldar, de esta manera tendrá más ingresos.-
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la responsabilidad y la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Felicitas is a member of the communal bank “Bellavista” located in the district of Puno, province and department of Puno. She is 42 years old, married, and has two school-age children. She is in secondary school. 

She has worked with Movimiento Manuela R. for two loan cycles. Her first loan was for S/. 500.00 nuevo soles which she invested in her business selling doors, windows, and different types of metals. With this loan of S/. 400.00 nuevo soles she will buy iron, tubing, and flat and angled iron. In her business she has workers who help her with her orders. She says that she takes bids. 

Her spouse works for the local government. She would like to have a roofing company and more welding machines, and this way she will get a higher income. What she likes about the communal bank is its responsibility and punctuality.

loans.use: to buy iron, tubing, flat and angled iron.

loans.name: Guadalupe Lucia

texts.es:
Guadalupe, de 31 años de edad, habita en el Calvarito un barrio popular localizado  en  la ciudad de León, es madre de 2 hijos 8 y 5 años  de edad, ambos están en la escuela, ella es comerciante, tiene una pulpería en su casa de habitación. Ella inicio esta negocio a la edad de 26 años con ayuda del padre de sus hijos, ya que ella quería independizarse y tener sus propios ingresos y aportar en el hogar, dejar de ser solo una ama de casa a ser madre de familia y dueña de un negocio al mismo tiempo ya tiene 5 años su pulpería la ido surtiendo poco a poco, con mucho esfuerzo y arduo trabajo. 

Ella requiere el préstamo para comprar productos tales como arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite huevo, enlatados, producto de limpieza, que son parte de la demanda de sus clientes. Ella quiere que su negocio este surtido de estos productos para satisfacer la demanda de sus  clientes, atraer nuevos clientela e ir mejorando cada día, ella piensa en lo futuro tener una distribuidora de productos alimenticios varios. Por lo pronto quiere introducir a su pulpería la venta de pollo y carnes que son productos que aun no ofrece pero que desea vender.
texts.en:
Guadalupe, 31 years old, lives in Calvarito, a crowded neighborhood in León. She has two children who are 8 and 5 years old and are both in school. She is a merchant and has a small store in her home. She began this business at 26 years old with the help of her children’s father. Since she wants to be independent, have her own income, and contribute to the household, so she stopped being just a housewife and to become a mother and business owner. She now has had her business for 5 years which she has grown little by little with much effort and hard work. 

She needs the loan to buy products such as rice, sugar, beans, oil, eggs, canned products, and cleaning products which are what her customers ask for. She wants her business to have this variety of products to satisfy customer demand, attract new customers, and improve every day. She believes that in the future she will offer a variety of foods. For now she wants to introduce the sale of chicken and meat which are products that no one is selling but that she wants to sell.

loans.use: to buy products like rice, sugar, beans, oil, eggs, canned goods, and cleaning products that her customers ask for

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina es socia del Banco Comunal “Bellavista” ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 30 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene un  hijo.  Cuenta con educación superior.
Su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió  en su negocio anterior (venta de abarrotes), actualmente se dedica a la venta de carros.  Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un año.
Su nuevo préstamo de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, lo utilizará para la refracción de su carro (pintarlo), también utilizará una parte para el mantenimiento de sus unidades, para luego venderlas.
Trabaja junto con su esposo, a veces su esposo trabaja independientemente en otras actividades.
La señora desea tener su casa propia y tener su propio negocio que le permita generar otros ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es el interés y las charlas respecto al negocio porque dice que  las ayuda.
texts.en:
Cristina is a member of the communal bank “Bellavista” located in the district of Puno, province and department of Puno. She is 30 years old and in a common law marriage, and she has a son. She has completed higher studies. 

Her first loan was for S/. 500.00 nuevo soles which she invested in her previous business (grocery store). Now she sells cars. She’s been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for one year. Her new loan is for S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, she will use it to refurbish her car (paint it), also she will use the loan for auto work on her cars which she will later sell. 

She works with her husband. Sometimes her husband works independently in other businesses. She would like to have her own house and to have her own business which will allow her to secure other methods of income. What she likes about the communal bank is the interest and the business lectures because she says that helps the members.

loans.use: to refurbish her car (paint it) and to do auto work on her other cars.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
María, es soltera ella se dedica a vender pupusas de queso, chicharon, revueltas y bebidas, gaseosas, chocolate y refrescos  por las tardes sábado y domingo.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar materia prima como (maíz, quesillo,chicharon y aceite) de esa forma podrá tener más ingresos y tendrá siempre lo necesario para mantener el negocio.
El sueño de María es que el negocio crezca y poder aumentar en sus ingresos y tener lo necesario para vivir mejor.
texts.en:
María is single and sells pupusas (stuffed tortillas) made of cheese, pork crackling, scrambled eggs as well as drinks and sodas, chocolate and soft drinks on Saturday and Sunday evenings. 

She will use the loan to buy raw materials such as: corn, cheese, pork crackling and oil. In this way she will have more income and she will always have what she needs to stay in business. 

Maria's dream is that the business grow, her income increase and that she have enough to live a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn, cheese, pork crackling and oil.

loans.name: Elio Enrique

texts.es:
Elio de 38 años de edad, vive junto a su familia en su casa propia, cuentan con servicio de luz solamente, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Paijan, una zona agrícola y ganadera que se encuentra situada en el departamento de La Libertad.

Elio brinda servicio de transporte de pasajeros en su mototaxi, un vehículo que consiste de una moto y una cabina para movilizar personas en su interior (máximo 3 personas), la actividad que realiza lo hace durante todo el día hasta las 6 de la tarde, a pesar de la competencia en el rubro trata de obtener los ingresos necesarios para solventar su necesidades familiares.

Desea solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1300 nuevos soles para usarlo en el mantenimiento y cambio de algunos accesorios a su mototaxi. Necesita mantener su mototaxi en buenas condiciones para seguir ofreciendo un buen servicio a sus clientes. Con la ayuda del préstamo, espera aumentar sus ingresos y seguir ayudando económicamente a su familia.
texts.en:
Elio, 38, lives with his family in their own house that is equipped with power and water.  It is located in a rural zone of Paijan district, an area that focuses on agriculture and cattle raising in La Libertad department.

Elio has a motortaxi transport service.  His motortaxi has a cabin that holds up to 3 people and he works daily until 6.  Despite having competition in the area, he tries to make enough money to cover his family’s expenses.

He is requesting a loan of 1300 new sols for the maintenance of his motortaxi and to change some accessories.  He needs to keep it in shape to continue offering good service to his customers.  The loan will help him increase his income and continuing helping his family financially.

loans.use: to provide maintenance and change some of the accessories on his motortaxi.

loans.name: Aurora Celia

texts.es:
Aurora es socia del Banco Comunal “Bellavista” ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 63 años de edad, está separada de su esposo y tiene 8  hijos independientes.  Solo estudió la primaria (incompleta).
La señora es una socia nueva que recientemente se incorpora a trabajar con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, solicitará un préstamo por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en la compra de una arroba de papa, camote, occa (tubérculo) y un bolsa de gelatina, la señora vende estos productos por algunos mercados de la zona.
 La señora desea seguir con el negocio y mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo
texts.en:
Aurora is a member of the Bellavista communal bank, which is in the Puno district, Puno province and department.  She is 63 years old, separated, and has eight independent children.  She only attended elementary school, and she did not complete it.

She is a new member who recently joined to work with the Moviento Manuela Ramos.  She will request a loan for 500 soles to buy an “arroba” (24-36 pounds) of potatoes, sweet potatoes, “occa” (a tuber), and a bag of gelatin.  She sells these products at some of the markets in the area.

She wishes to continue with her business and improve her income.

What she likes about the communal bank are the easy terms of the loan.

loans.use: to buy an “arroba” (24-36 pounds) of potatoes, sweet potatoes, “occa” (a tuber), and a bag of gelatin.

loans.name: Yedi

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal ”IMASUMAC II”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Yedi; El socio tiene 27 años de edad, el socio es conviviente, el socio tiene 2 hijos menores y él se dedica a prestar el servicio de taxi, el socio tiene una unidad vehicular el cual lo hace trabajar prestando servicio urbano de taxi, el socio cobra 2.50 la carrera y cuando es un poco lejos cobra 3 nuevos soles, el socio desea en esta ocasión invertir el préstamo en el mantenimiento de sus unidad ya que le ha estado fallando un poco, el socio desea poner operativo su carro para continuar laborando. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en el mantenimiento de su unidad vehicular y de este modo continuar creciendo económicamente y seguir apoyando en casa con los hijos y la conyugue.

El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Yedi belongs to the Imasumac II communal bank, which is in the Huanchac district, Cusco province and department.

Yedi is 27 years old, has a life partner, and has two minor children.  He provides taxi service.  He has a vehicle that he works in providing urban taxi service.  He charges 2.5 per trip, and if it’s far away he charges 3 soles.  

He now wishes to use the loan for maintenance to his vehicle.  It has been failing a bit, and he wishes to make his car operational in order to continue working.  He is requesting the loan for maintenance on his vehicle.  This way he will continue growing financially, and he will continue supporting his wife and children.

He is grateful for the loan, and he pledges to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance on his vehicle in order to continue growing financially and to continue supporting his wife and children.

loans.name: Daysi

texts.es: Daysi de 39 años de edad,labora como docente de Educación Primaria en La Escuela Mauricio Cajina de la zona # 2 de Nueva Guinea, solicita su 9no crédito para invertirlo en mejora de su vivienda esperando continuar siendo beneficiada para ponerle el piso a su casa y de esta manera darle mejores condiciones de vida a sus hijos los cuales están estudiando la primaria y por ende un mejor ambiente, en su barrio es bien reconocida y querida ya que es una docente con gran experiencia en este ramo, su mayor sueño es sacar adelante a sus tres hijos con una buena preparación académica y darle una buena educación y formación para que sean hombres y mujeres de bien en el futuro
texts.en: Daysi is 39 years old. She a primary school teacher at the Mauricio Cajina School in zone #2, Nueva Guinea. She asking for her 9th loan to invest in home improvements. She hopes to continue being a beneficiary in order to add a floor to her house and in this way give her children better living conditions as they are in primary school and need a better environment. She is well-known and loved in her neighbourhood as she has extensive experience as a primary school teacher. Her biggest dream is to get her 3 children ahead in life with a good academic background, a good education and training so that they become well-off men and women in the future.

loans.use: to remodel the house.

loans.name: Amparo Isabel

texts.es:
Amparo es socia del Banco Comunal “Bellavista” ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 38 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos.  Estudió hasta la secundaria.
Su préstamo anterior fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que utilizo en su negocio de venta de abarrotes.  Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace tres ciclos.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 700.00 nuevo soles, comprará arroz, azúcar, gaseosas, y otros insumos para su tienda, en le negocio le ayuda su mamá.  Su esposo trabaja independientemente.
La señora desea seguir y crecer en el negocio para mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es el ahorro y su ganancia.
texts.en:
Amparo is a member of Bellavista Communal Bank, located in the district of Puno, province and department of Puno.  She is 38 years old, lives with her life partner, and has two children.  She studied through high school.

Her previous loan was for the sum of 300 PEN, money she used in her business selling groceries.  She has worked with the Manuela Ramos movement for three loan cycles.

With this new loan of 700 PEN she will buy rice, sugar, sodas, and other supplies for her store.  Her mother helps her in the business.  Her husband works independently.

She wants to continue with the business and grow, to improve her earnings.

What she likes about the communal bank are the savings and her profit.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, sodas, and other supplies.

loans.name: Agustina

texts.es:
Agustina es socia del Banco Comunal “Bellavista” ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 45 años de edad, es soltera y tiene 4 hijos, tres de ellos son independientes.  Cuenta con estudios de técnico en enfermería.
La señora se dedica a la venta de prendas policiales y alquila unidades para transportes (taxi), hace tres años trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles dinero que invirtió en sus negocios.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,700.00 nuevo soles, comprará prendas policiales como botas, gorros, zapatos, golfán, uniformes para todas las unidades, en el negocio le ayuda su hija.
La señora desea tener otro bazar para poder abastecer con más prendas y accesorios.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la amistad de las socias, la responsabilidad, la puntualidad y las charlas respecto al negocio.
texts.en:
Agustina is a member of the “Bellavista” Communal Bank, located in the Puno district, in the Puno province and department. She is 45 years old and single with 4 children, three of whom are independent. She studied as a nursing technician.She makes her living by selling police uniforms and renting some vehicles for transportation (taxi). 

She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for three years. Her first loan was in the amount of 300 nuevos soles which she invested in her businesses. With this new loan of 1,700 nuevos soles, she will purchase police garments like boots, caps, shoes, "golfáns" and uniforms for all the units. Her daughter helps her in the business. She wants to have another shop to supply more garments and accessories. What she likes about the Communal Bank is the friendship of the other members, their responsibility, punctuality, and the talks regarding her business.

loans.use: to purchase police garments like boots, caps, shoes, other items and uniforms

loans.name: Luisa Emilia

texts.es: Luisa Emilia de 49 años labora como docente en una secundaria impartiendo el pan de la enseñanza en la especialidad de Español, desde hace 28 años, ella recibe el apoyo económico de sus dos hijas que también labora como docente para solventar juntos los gastos del hogar; Luisa solicita su crédito el que invertirá en reparación de su vivienda ya que algunas paredes se le estan deteriorando y desea repararlas para darle a su casa mayor seguridad. Se caracteriza por ser una persona con gran expeciencia y capacidad, honesta y trabajadora, querida por sus estudiantes y compañeros de trabajo. Sueña con seguir apoyando a su familia para que estos salgan adelante,  y quiere heredarles una casa con buena infraestructura.
texts.en:
Luisa Emilia is 49 years old and works as a teacher in a high school.  She gives Spanish classes and has been in this job for 28 years.  She receives financial support from her two daughters, who also work as teachers, to cover the household expenses.

Luisa is requesting her ninth loan which she will invest in repairing her home as some of her walls are in a bad state of repair and she would like to fix them up in order to make her home safer.  Luisa is noted as being a woman with a lot of experience and skill.  She is honest and hard working, and well liked by her students and work colleagues.  She dreams of continuing to support her family so that they can get ahead in life.  She would like to leave them a house with good infrastructure.

loans.use: to repair the walls in her home.

loans.name: Elva

texts.es:
Elva D. 70 años D. edad, es viuda, vive en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio sólo D. luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito D. TambogranD. que pertenece al departamento D. Piura.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

La actividad que desarrolla Elva es la agricultura, cuenta con sus propias tierras D. cultivo donD. siembra limón, una vez que realiza su cosecha sus productos los ofrece a los diferentes mercados D. Piura y así pueD. obtener ingresos para cubrir sus gastos D. su casa.  También cuenta con algunos animales D. corral los cuales cría y luego comercializa.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 500 nuevos soles para comprar fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras como su producto y alimento balanceado para sus animales, con la finalidad que con su cosecha obtenga mejoras económicas para ella.  Elva a pesar D. su edad sigue trabajando con mucho esfuerzo para seguir mejorando en la vida.
texts.en:
Elva, 70, is a widow.  She lives in her own home, which has only electricity, located in a rural area of the district of TambogranD., in the department of Piura.  The area is known for agriculture, livestock, and handicrafts.

Elva works in agriculture.  She has her own croplands where she grows lemons.  Once her crop is harvested, she offers her products in different markets in Piura so she can get earnings to cover her household expenses.  She also has several yard animals that she raises and then sells.

Elva has requested a loan of 500 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to buy fertilizers to improve her land and her product, and balanced feed for her animals.  Her goal is to obtain economic improvement with her crops.

In spite of her age, Elva continues working with great effort to continue improving her life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to improve her land and her product, and balanced feed for her animals.

loans.name: Yessenia Del Rosario

texts.es:
Yessenia de 22 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres,  cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Chulucanas que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Toda esta zona sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Yessenia se dedica a la venta de cerveza y elaboración, venta de chicha de jora (es una bebida rica elaborada a base de maíz y  muy consumida en el norte del Perú), esta actividad los realiza desde hace un año, ya que es una costumbre que ha pasado de generación en generación. Últimamente se ha incrementado las ventas de la chicha de jora y cerveza en la zona donde vive, lo que le ha favorecido para poder incrementar sus ingresos y solventar sus gastos personales.

Teniendo la oportunidad de crecer Yessenia a solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de cerveza y harina de maíz para la elaboración de chicha de jora, con la finalidad de obtener mayores ganancias y así sus clientes aumenten, para solventar el crédito otorgado y para que pueda seguir ayudando económicamente a sus padres.
texts.en:
Yessenia is 22 years old.  She is single and lives in her parents' home, which has only electricity (no running water).  Their home is located in the rural area of Chulucanas district, which is part of Piura department.  Throughout this area, the villagers work in agriculture, livestock and handicrafts.

Yessenia works selling beer and making and selling chica de jora (this is a delicious drink made from a base of corn which is drunk a lot in the north of Peru).  She has been doing this for the last year, as it is a tradition that has been passed down the generations.  Recently she has increased her sales of chicha de jora and beer in the area where she lives.  This has been good news for her, as she has been able to increase her income and cover her personal expenses.

Yessenia has requested a loan of 1,500 New Soles from Edpyme Alternativa as she has the opportunity for growth.  She will use the loan to purchase a greater quantity of beer and cornflour for preparing chicha de jora.  Her ultimate goal is to earn greater income and grow her customers, so as to cover repayments for the offered loan and be able to continue to help her parents out financially.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of beer and cornflour for preparing chicha de jora (a drink made from corn).

loans.name: Ines

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE ANDAHUAYLILLAS”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Ines; La socia tiene 31años de edad, la socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 2 hijos de 9 y 3 años de edad; la socia se dedica  a la crianza de animales menores, la socia cría cuyes y aves de corral, ella también elabora chicha a base de maíz, la socia tiene un terreno en el cual siembra y cosecha maíz amarillo para la realización de la chicha de jora o chicha de maíz fermentado; La socia también elabora comidas caseras, la socia desea invertir su crédito en la compra de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, también en la compra de arroz, azúcar al por mayor. La socia solicita el pre4stamo para invertir en la compra de animales menores para la venta y de insumos para la elaboración de sus comidas típicas caseras.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE ANDAHUAYLILLAS”. The communal bank is located in the district of Andahuaylillas in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member is Señora Ines.  She is 31 years old and is in a live-in relationship; she has two children aged 9 and 3.  Ines works raising small animals, specifically guinea pigs and farmyard poultry.  She also makes chicha (a local drink) from a corn base.  Ines has land where she grows and harvests yellow corn for making chicha de jora or chicha made from fermented corn.  She also makes homemade meals.

Ines wants to invest her loan in purchasing small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens.  She also wants to use it to purchase rice and sugar at wholesale.  Ines is requesting the loan to purchase small animals for sale, and ingredients for making her typical homemade meals.

Ines is grateful for the loan, and commits to comply with her loan repayment schedule.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of small animals for sale, and ingredients for preparing her typical homemade meals.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es: Andrea de 42 años de edad es casada, labora como docente desde hace 22 años, impartiendo clase a niños de Educación Primaria.  Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo que asume los gastos del hogar. Andrea solicita su crédito para mejorar su vivienda reparando el techo de la casa que esta en mal estado y así darle un ambiente mejor a su famlia. En la comunidad es conocida como una persona de buenas costumbres, con muy buenas relaciones humanas apreciada por sus estudiantes, sus planes para el futuro es tener una casa con buena infraestructura digna para su familia
texts.en: Andrea, 42, is married and has been working as a teacher for 22 years, giving classes to elementary school kids. She has her husband's support, who pays the household expenses. Andrea is asking for a loan to improve her home since the roof is in very bad shape, and she wants to improve her home environment for her family. In her community, she is known as a person with good customs, good relationships and is very appreciated by her students. Her plans in the future are to have a house with a good infrastructure for her family.

loans.use: to repair her roof.

loans.name: Norma Rocio

texts.es:
Norma de 29 años de edad,es soltera, reside juntocon sus padres en cu casa, cuenta con los servicios de agua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito Yonan que pertenece al deparatamento de Cajamarca.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad minera, agrícola y ganadera.

Desde hace 5 años Norma a colocado en su casa su negocio donde vende todo tipo de productos de ferretaria, en este rubro no hay competencia y tiene buena acogida con sus clientes por los productos innovadores que ofrece en su ferretería, con los ingresos que persiva podrásolventar sus gastos y necesidades personales.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles para la compra de mercadería en mayor cantidad, ya que sus ventas se han ido incrementando y necesita satisfacer los pedidos de sus clientes, con las ganacias que obtenga podrá pagar su crédito y puede seguir ayudando a salir adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Norma is 29 years old and single.  She lives with her parents in their home, which has running water and electricity. It is located in the urban area of the Yonan district, which belongs to Cajamarca department.  This area is characterized by mining, agriculture and livestock.

For the last five years, Norma as had a business in her home where she sells all kinds of hardware.  There isn't any competition in this sector, and she is recognized by her customers for the innovative products that she offers for sale in her hardware store.  With the income she earns, she is able to cover her personal expenses and necessities.

She has requested a loan of 3,000 New Soles from Edpyme Alternativa for the purchase of a greater quantity of merchandise, as her sales have been growing and she needs to meet her customers' orders.  With the earnings she will get, she will be able to pay back her loan and be able to continue helping her family to move ahead in life.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of merchandise for her hardware store.

loans.name: Katerin Frida

texts.es:
Katerin es socia del Banco Comunal “Bellavista” ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 19 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos.  La señora estudio educación superior.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un año, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en la compra de prendas de vestir para su negocio.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1500.00 nuevo soles comprará ropas para niños como overoles, camisas, chompas pantalones y jeans, la mercadería la compra en Desaguadero junto con su amiga  y la vende en la ciudad de Puno.  Nos cuenta que paralelamente también trabaja en un foto estudio.
La señorita desea abrir una tienda bien surtida de prendas de vestir de diferentes modelos, marcas y diseños.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la solidaridad y la capacitación que les dan sobre temas respecto al negocio.
texts.en:
Katerin is a member of the "Bellavista" communal bank, which is located in the district of Puno, in the province and department of Puno.  She is 19 years old, and is single without children.  She is studying in higher education.

She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for the last year.  Her initial loan was for 500 New Soles, money which she invested in purchasing items of clothing for her business.

With this new loan of 1,500 New Soles she will buy children's clothing such as overalls, shirts, sweaters, pants and jeans.  She buys her merchandise in Desaguadero with her friend, and sells it in the city of Puno.  She tells us that she also works in a photo studio.

The Señorita wants to open a store that is well-stocked with clothing of different styles, brands and designs.

What she likes about the communal bank is it's unity and the training that's given on business-related topics.

loans.use: to buy children's clothing such as overalls, shirts, sweaters, pants and jeans.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to continue improving her home

loans.name: Yoni

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE ANDAHUAYLILLAS”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Yoni; La socia tiene 34años de edad, la socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 2 hijos de 10 y 5 años de edad; la socia se dedica a la costura, la socia tiene un taller de costura en su propia casa y todo el pueblo la conoce, ella cose las diferentes prendas de los vecinos y de la mayoría en el pueblo, la socia es una señora muy querida y respetada, la socia en esta ocasión desea invertir el crédito en la compra de cierres, hilos de colores, agujas para la maquina, telas para ternos y blusas, la socia con lo que ingresa de su trabajo paga las cuentas en casa y el pago de estudios de sus menores hijos. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de hilos de colores, agujas para la maquina, telas para hacer ternos y camisas, blusas.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the village bank "Las Emprendedoras de Andahuaylillas" [The Entrepreneurs of Andahuaylillas]. The bank is located in the district of Andahuaylillas in the province and department of Cusco. 

Yoni is 34, married and has two children ages 10 and 5. She is a seamstress and has a workshop in her home. The whole town knows her. She makes different garments for her neighbors and most of the town. She is a very cherished and respected woman. On this occasion, she wants to invest the loan in the purchase of fasteners, colored thread, sewing machine needles, and fabric for suits and blouses. The borrower uses the income from her work to pay the bills and pay for her young children's schooling. 

She is grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments according to the timeline.

loans.use: to buy colored thread, sewing machine needles, and fabric to make suits, shirts and blouses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve his home.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE ANDAHUAYLILLAS”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Dominga; La socia tiene 38 años de edad, la socia es soltera, la socia tiene 2 hijos de 12 y 3 años de edad; la socia se dedica a la crianza de cuyes, la socia cría cuyes al por mayor, ella desea comprar 100 cuyes para criarlos y una vez que alcanza la madures ella los lleva  a vender a la ciudad de Puerto Maldonado, la socia desea invertir el crédito en la compra de sus cuyes y de este modo incrementar los que ya tiene y poder crecer económicamente. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de cuyes ella tiene pensado comprar 100 cuyes para incrementar su  negocio.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "Las Emprendedoras de Andahuaylillas." The communal bank is located in the district of Andahuaylillas in the province and department of Cusco.

The member's name is Dominga. She is 38 years old, single, and has two children who are 12 and 3 years old. She makes a living raising large quantities of guinea pigs. She hopes to buy and raise 100 guinea pigs and take them to the city of Puerto Maldonado to sell once they reach maturity. She would like to invest the loan in the purchase of guinea pigs and thus increase the number that she has already and be able to grow. She requests the loan in order to invest in the purchase of guinea pigs and she plans to buy 100 of them to improve her business.

Dominga is thankful for the loan and commits to honoring the payments in accordance with the payment schedule.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of guinea pigs. She plans to buy 100 guinea pigs to improve her business.

loans.name: Darlin Suyen

texts.es: Darlin Suyen de 24 años de edad, labora como Técnico en estadística en el Ministerio de Educación en el área de Educación de adultos, desde hace 5 años. es una joven emprendedora, que a salido adelante junto a su familia, el cual estudia y trabaja a la vez.  Solicita su 2do crédito para invertirlo en compra de materiales de construcción y así hacerle mejoras a su casa de habitación,  en su centro de trabajo es bien reconocida por sus buenas relaciones humanas que la caracterizan al igual que en su comunidad, sus metas para el futuro es tener un hogar donde haya condiciones que a ella la hagan sentirse realizada como familia.
texts.en:
Darlin Suyen is 24 years old and she has worked as a Statistical Technician for the Ministry of Education in the area of Adult Education for the past 5 years. She is an enterprising young woman who works and studies simultaneously and has come out on top together with her family.

She is applying for her second loan to invest in the purchase of construction materials to make improvements to her home. She is recognized and noted for her good human relations in her workplace, as well as in her community. 

Her goal for the future is to have a home where the conditions allow the achievement of a sense of family.

loans.use: to buy materials

loans.name: Damar Cirilo

texts.es: Damar Cirilo de 33 años de edad, labora en un centro educativo en Nueva Guiea, como guarda de seguridad desde 1 año, solicita su crédito con el objetivo de invertirlo en mejoras de su vivienda, cambiando el techo que está en mal estado. Se caracteriza por ser honesto, honrado y trabajador, donde se relaciona con su comunidad y compañeros de trabajo, el planea para el futuro darle un ambiento mejor a sus dos hijos para que estos crezcan sanos y felices como toda una familia unidad y el sentirse realizado como padre jefe de hogar.
texts.en:
Damar Cirilo, 33, has been working for a year as a guard at an education center in Nueva Guinea.  He is known for being honest, honorable, and hardworking in his relationships in the community and with coworkers.  

He is requesting his first loan with the goal of investing it in home improvements, to change the roof, which is in bad condition.

In the future he plans to give his two children a better environment so they grow up healthy and happy as a united family, and to feel fulfilled as a father and head of household.

loans.use: to improve his house.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE ANDAHUAYLILLAS”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Olga; La socia tiene 30 años de edad, la socia es soltera, la socia tiene 1 hijo de 5 años de edad, la socia se dedica  a la compra y venta de artesanía, ella vende en la plaza principal del pueblo junto a otras artesanas todos los días, la socia en esta ocasión desea invertir el crédito en la compra de artesanía para poder vender a los turistas que visitan el bello poblado típico de Andahuaylillas. La socia desea el préstamo para invertir en la compra de artesanía para la venta.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "Las Emprendedeoras de Andahuaylillas." The communal bank is located in the district of Andahuaylillas in the province and department of Cusco.

The member's name is Olga. She is 30 years old, single, and has one child who's 5 years old. She makes a living buying and selling handicrafts. She sells in the main plaza of the small town together with other craftswomen every day. This time she would like to invest the loan in the purchase of handicrafts in order to be able to sell to the tourists who visit the beautiful village typical of Andahuaylillas. She would like the loan to invest in buying handicrafts to sell.

She is thankful for the loan and has committed to honoring the payments in accordance with the payment schedule.

loans.use: to invest the in purchase of handicrafts to sell.

loans.name: Benjamin Muthui

texts.en:
Benjamin is a 33 year old married man. He has two children, ages 2 and 5.  He describes himself as quiet, cooperative and determined. 

He operates a fruits and vegetables business where he sells oranges, capsicums and other groceries.  He has been involved in this business for 3 years and employs 1 staff member. His business is located in a busy shopping center. 

He says his biggest business challenge is a lack of finances.  He will use the Kes 40,000 loan to buy more fruit to sell.

His business goal is to grow his business into a wholesale operation within 5 years.  He also hopes to buy a plot of land in which he will build rental units.

loans.use: to buy more fruits.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE ANDAHUAYLILLAS”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Maritza; La socia tiene 31 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 2 hijos de 8 y 2 años de edad, la socia se dedica  a la atención de venta de jugos de frutas, ella tiene su stand en el mercado principal y la socia prepara ricos jugos de frutas frescas todos los días en las mañanas y por las tardes, la socia desea invertir el crédito en la compra de fruta y de mercadería para la juguería como vasos y otros utensilios que desea comprar para mejorar su calidad de atención. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de utensilios como vasos, y de frutas frescas para implementar su negocio.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Maritza belongs to the "Las Emprendedoras de Andahuaylillas" communal bank, located in Andahuaylillas district in the province and department of Cusco.  She is 31, and lives with her partner. She has two children, ages eight and two. 

She sells fruit juices, and has her stand in the main market.  She prepares delicious fruit juices every day in the mornings and afternoons. 

She wishes to use her loan to buy fruit and other items she needs for the juice stand, such as glasses and kitchen utensils, in order to improve the quality of her service.  She is applying for the loan to buy glasses, kitchen utensils, and fresh fruit for her business. 

She is grateful for the loan, and promises to pay her instalments in accordance with the payment schedule.

loans.use: To buy kitchen utensils, glasses and fresh fruit for her business.

loans.name: Mary Njamiu

texts.en:
Mary is a 38 year old married woman. She has 2 children, ages 14 years and 18. She describes herself as loving. 

She operates a flower sales business in a busy shopping center in Mombasa.  Mary has been involved in this business for 10 years. 

Mary says her biggest business challenge is a lack of finances.  She will use the Kes 50,000 loan to add to her stock of flowers.  Her business goal is to grow it into a wholesale operation within five years. 

She hopes that in the future, she can afford to educate her children and build a home for her family.

loans.use: to add stock of flowers

loans.name: Sumya

texts.en:
Sumya is 34 years old and lives with his wife in Mongolia.  His wife is a local secondary school teacher and they have been married for ten years. 

He provides transport services for a living.  He owns a sedan and pick-up truck to meet his customers needs.  Recently, Sumya sold his cars to buy a newer sedan.  

He is a hard working and diligent man who says, "It is hard to maintain two old cars at the same time."  He is requesting a 2,500,000 MNT loan to buy a new car.

loans.use: to buy a new car

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE ANDAHUAYLILLAS”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Guillermina; La socia tiene 56 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 3 hijos de 31,28,26 años de edad, la socia tiene un restaurante el cual ella misma administra y lo atiende, la socia prepara deliciosos potajes para los pobladores y los turistas que visitan este bello y tradicional poblado, la socia en esta oportunidad desea invertir el crédito en la compra de insumos tales como arroz, al por mayor en saco, azúcar para los tés que sirve y los cafés, aceite en bidón grande para las frituras, papa al por mayor y otros productos que requiere. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos e ingredientes para la preparación de sus diversos potajes.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Guillermina belongs to the "Las Emprendedoras de Andahuaylillas" communal bank, located in the Andahuaylillas district, in Cusco province and department.  

She is 56, and lives with her partner. She has three children, ages 31, 28, and 26. She has a restaurant that she runs and serves her customers in. She prepares delicious dishes for local people, and the tourists that visit this beautiful traditional village.  

On this occasion she wishes to use the loan to buy ingredients; such as bags of rice at wholesale, sugar for the teas and coffees she serves, a large barrel of cooking oil for frying, potatoes at wholesale, and other products she needs. She is applying for the loan to buy supplies and ingredients for preparing her various dishes. 

Guillermina is grateful for the loan, and promises to pay her instalments in accordance with the payment schedule.

loans.use: To buy supplies and ingredients for preparing her various dishes.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 33 year old single woman.  She has an eight year old child.  Mary describes herself as God fearing and honest. 

She operates a charcoal sales business and also sells cereal.  She has been involved in this business for 6 years, located near a residential area in Mombasa.  Mary says her biggest business challenge is the fluctuation of commodity prices. 

Mary will use the Kes 50,000 loan to increase her stock of charcoal.  Her business goal is to create a wholesale operation within 5 years.  She hopes to buy a plot of land where she can run her business.

loans.use: to increase stock of charcoal

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fruit, and glass containers for fruit drinks.

loans.name: Tuvshinjargal

texts.en:
Tuvshinjargal is 44 years old and lives with her three kids and her father in an apartment in the Baganuur district of Ulaanbaatar, a capital city of Mongolia. 

Her father is a retired older man who stays at home.  Her husband died in a factory accident and her oldest two kids are in college and younger one is in school. 

She has worked as a pharmacist since 2002.   She became a pharmacy owner in 2011.  Now she needs more assets in order to run a pharmacy business well. 

Tuvshinjargal is a strong and diligent woman who says, "Even though it was hard to raise three kids all by my own, I never stepped back and I never will."

She is requesting a 3,000,000 MNT loan to buy more medicine to increase her working capital.

loans.use: to buy more medicine

loans.name: Kennedy

texts.en:
Kennedy is a 38 year old married man.  They have two children, ages 3 and 7. He describes himself as God fearing, honest, and ambitious. 

He operates a rickshaw transport services business where he provides transport services to local people.  He has been involved in this business for one year, near a residential area in Mombasa. 

He describes his biggest business challenge as fluctuating fuel prices. He will use the Kes 50,000 loan to purchase another rickshaw.  His business goal is to own a fleet of rickshaws within 5 years. 

He hopes that in the future, he will have a garage and an auto spare parts shop. He also hopes to give his children a good university level education.

loans.use: to buy another rickshaw

loans.name: Tilekbai

texts.en:
Tilekbai is 44 years old and lives with his wife and 4 kids in a Ger (tent), in Mongolia.  His wife is a waitress; eldest son is in college and the other children are in school. 

He started his livestock trading business 2005 by renting a space in a local market.  He buys his stock from rural areas.  

His living condition is average.  Now that winter is approaching, he need more assets.  He is a hardworking and diligent man who says, "I have a mission to graduate my kids from college."  He is requesting 3,000,000 MNT to purchase more livestock to increase his assets.

loans.use: to purchase more livestock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stationery

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase the stock of clothes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase stock of clothes

loans.name: Ganbaatar

texts.en:
Ganbaatar is 40 years old and lives with his wife and three kids in a ger (tent like structure) in Mongolia.  His wife is a cook in a local cafe and their kids go to school. 

He started his transportation business in 2008.  During winter, he buys and transports coal from a mining site and wholesales the coal at area markets. 

Now that winter is approaching and the coal price isn't high yet, he is planning to buy and store it for business.  He is an intelligent and hardworking man who says, "This winter I will work hard to upgrade my truck."  He is requesting 700,000 MNT to buy coal.

loans.use: to buy coal

loans.name: Zipporah Kagwiria

texts.en:
Zipporah is a 37 year old married woman.  She has two children.  Zipporah describes herself as self-driven and hardworking. 

She sells clothes to the local people and has been involved in this business for 6 years.  Her business is located in a busy shopping center.  

Zipporah says her biggest business challenge is insufficient capital.  She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to increase her stock of clothes.  Her business goal is to grow her business into a wholesale operation within 5 years.  She hopes that in the future, she will own a boutique.

loans.use: to increase stock of clothes

loans.name: Ulziitogtoh

texts.en:
Ulziitogtoh is 35 years old and lives with her mother, sister and daughter in ger (tent like structure), in Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia.  She is divorced and her daughter goes to school. 

She started her garment retailing business in 2008 by renting a counter in a market.  Her counter is filled with fashionable clothes and accessories.  Many of her customers visit the market just to see her products. 

She is a strong and diligent woman who says, "Now that my business is going well, I want to build my house for my daughter and me."  She is requesting 3,000,000 to buy construction materials for her house.

loans.use: to buy a construction materials.

loans.name: Josephat

texts.en:
Josephat is a 27 year old married man. He has a one month old child.  He describes himself as quiet and polite. 

He operates a restaurant where he sells food to the local people and has been in business for a year.  Josephat's restaurant is located in a busy shopping centre. 

Josephat says his biggest business challenge is high commodity prices due to inflation.  He will use the Kes 15000 loan to increase his stock of food items.  

His business goal is to open a bigger restaurant within 5 years. He hopes to educate his children and put up a residential house for his family.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, detergents etc

loans.name: Manuel Alejandro

texts.es: El señor Manuel, es natural de la ciudad de Chincha, es casado tiene 2 hijos menores de 2 y 1 año respectivamente, el señor Manuel se dedica a la construcción, es albañil tiene en este oficio varios años ya que su padre le enseño desde muy niño.  El señor  Manuel es muy trabajador por lo cual solicita el crédito para la compra de herramientas para realizar obras a mayor escala y así poder lograr todas sus metas. Su sueño o meta del Sr. Manuel es adquirir una vivienda propia y mejorar la calidad de vida de él y su familia. El Sr. Manuel esta muy agradecido por el crédito otorgado.
texts.en:
Manuel, a native of the city of Chincha, is married and has two young children, ages 2 and 1.  He has worked in construction as a builder for several years, as his father taught him since he was a child.

Manuel is very hardworking, which is why he is requesting the loan to buy tools to do construction work on a larger scale and in this way achieve all his goals.

Manuel's dream or goal is to acquire his own home and improve his and his family's quality of life.  He is very grateful for the loan granted.

loans.use: to buy construction tools to do his construction work.

loans.name: Alimaa

texts.en:
Alimaa is 60 years old and lives with her husband and child in a ger (tent like structure), in Huvsgul province, Mongolia.  Her husband is in the agriculture business and her child goes to college. 

Before retiring, Alimaa was an accountant.  Now she owns a vegetable trading business, started in 2000.  She also operates a tailoring business.  She mostly sews souvenir for tourists, like felt crafts, traditional clothes and shoes.  She has two tailors.  Alimaa is also a part time craft consultant. 

Alimaa is a sharp and hard working woman who says, "I love my job and it makes me feel young again."  She is requesting 2,000,000 MNT to buy  materials to make shoes and Mongolian traditional clothes.

loans.use: to buy  materials

loans.name: Eveling

texts.es:
Eveling tiene como planes mejor la infraestructura ya que requiere mejoras en el techo y otros puntos de la casa que están en mal estado. Con el ciclo del préstamo anterior logro establecer un punto de venta en su casa de habitación en el cual está ofreciendo a su clientes nuevos productos como almuerzo, refresco, gaseosa entre otros. Además beneficiándose en el lado social y económico de la familia, su hija logrando terminar los estudios e iniciar en el campo laboral.
Está solicitando el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de materia prima como: cajillas de gaseosas, granos básicos, compra de café, pan y también comprar utensilio de cocina, barriles para hacer nacatamales, cucharones, Valdés, bolsa plásticas, golosinas entre otro productos. Agradece a la financiera por la oportunidad de crecer en el hábito social y económico.
texts.en:
Eveling plans to improve the infrastructure, since she needs improvements in her roof and other parts of the house that are in bad condition.  With the previous loan cycle she managed to set up in her home a place to sell, in which she is offering her customers new products like lunch, soft drinks, sodas, and others.  Besides benefitting her family socially and economically, her daughter has managed to finish her studies and begin in the labor market.
